none.comment: The none radius token is characterized by crisp, angular edges, providing a clean and sharp appearance to your design elements.

normal.comment: The normal radius token strikes a balance between softness and structure.

large.comment: The large radius token makes a bold visual statement by significantly rounding the corners of elements.

rounded.comment: The rounded radius token embraces a curvier design language, introducing a high degree of softness and fluidity to your elements.
